attributes.action: direct his Minister to intervene before the opportunity to preserve an 145 year old historic ship, the City of Adelaide, part of our collective regional, national & international heritage is lost forever.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This ship is the only surviving ship and most vital icon imaginable of the making of modern Australia and of the relationship between Britain and the Australian Colonies. 




The ship is due for destruction by its current owners & will be lost forever unless Sunderland City Council provide a berth to move the vessel back to its native dock on the River Wear, Sunderland, Tyne and Wear.
